text: Ilham Heydar oglu Aliyev (born December 24, 1961) is the current President of Azerbaijan. He became president in 2003. ==Career== Aliyev succeeded his father Heydar Aliyev who was president of Azerbaijan from 1993 to 2003. On August 4, 2003, two months before the presidential elections, he was made prime minister by his father who was very ill and dying. In October he easily won the presidential elections and became president on October 31, 2003. He also functions as the head of the New Azerbaijan Party. ==Personal life== He has been married to Mehriban Aliyeva since 1983. They have three children. ==Other websites== *The President of Azerbaijan Category:Dictators Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Baku Category:Azerbaijani nationalists Category:Current national leaders Category:Presidents of Azerbaijan Category:Prime ministers of Azerbaijan Category:New Azerbaijan Party politicians Category:21st-century Azerbaijani people Category:20th-century Azerbaijani people
title: Ilham Aliyev
